description: This source file defines a Python module for managing, searching, and validating TR-181 data model parameters. It includes classes, methods, and data structures to load seed data, search parameters by various filters, build hierarchical trees from parameter paths, and validate parameter values.

classes.name: TR181Catalog
classes.description: A class representing a catalog of TR-181 parameters, supporting loading seed data, searching, tree building, and validation.

classes.name: TR181CatalogError
classes.description: Custom exception for TR-181 catalog operation failures.

methods.name: int load_seed_data(self, source: str = "builtin")
methods.description: Loads seed TR-181 parameters from a specified source, returning the number of parameters loaded.

methods.name: List[Dict[str,Any]] search_parameters( self, path_prefix: Optional[str] = None, param_type: Optional[str] = None, access: Optional[str] = None )
methods.description: Searches for parameters matching given filters such as path prefix, type, and access level.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] build_tree(self, root_path: str = "Device")
methods.description: Builds a hierarchical tree structure of parameters starting from a specified root path.

methods.name: None _build_tree_recursive( self, node: Dict[str, Any], parameters: List[tuple], current_path: str )
methods.description: Recursively constructs tree nodes based on parameter paths.

methods.name: tuple[bool,List[Dict[str,str]]] validate_parameters(self, parameters: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Validates a dictionary of parameter paths and values against the schema and access permissions.

methods.name: Optional[Dict[str,Any]] get_parameter(self, path: str)
methods.description: Retrieves a specific parameter's data by its path.

methods.name: TR181Catalog create_tr181_catalog()
methods.description: Factory function that creates and returns an instance of TR181Catalog.

ctags.name: _build_tree_recursive
ctags.signature: ( self, node: Dict[str, Any], parameters: List[tuple], current_path: str )

ctags.name: build_tree
ctags.pattern: /^    def build_tree(self, root_path: str = "Device") -> Dict[str, Any]:$/

ctags.name: get_parameter
ctags.pattern: /^    def get_parameter(self, path: str) -> Optional[Dict[str, Any]]:$/

ctags.name: search_parameters
ctags.signature: ( self, path_prefix: Optional[str] = None, param_type: Optional[str] = None, access: Optional[str] = None )

ctags.name: validate_parameters
ctags.pattern: /^    def validate_parameters(self, parameters: Dict[str, Any]) -> tuple[bool, List[Dict[str, str]/
